SEARCH

Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
Shape
Triangle
public class Triangle extends Shape
A triangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas. Refactored to inherit from Shape class for better code reusability.
Version:
3.0 (October 2025)
Author:
Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes (Refactored for Ciclo 1-3)

  • Constructor Details

    • Triangle

      public Triangle()
      Create a new triangle at default position with default color.

    • Triangle

      public Triangle(int width, int height, int xPosition, int yPosition, String color)
      Create a new triangle with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      width - The base width of the triangle
      height - The height of the triangle
      xPosition - The x position of the triangle
      yPosition - The y position of the triangle
      color - The color of the triangle

  • Method Details

    • draw

      protected void draw()
      Draw the triangle with current specifications on screen.
      Specified by:
      draw in class Shape

    • changeSize

      public void changeSize(int newHeight, int newWidth)
      Change the size to the new size
      Parameters:
      newHeight - the new height in pixels. newHeight must be >=0.
      newWidth - the new width in pixels. newWidth must be >=0.

    • scale

      public void scale(double factor)
      Scale the triangle by a factor.
      Specified by:
      scale in class Shape
      Parameters:
      factor - The scaling factor (1.0 = no change, 2.0 = double size, 0.5 = half size)

    • getArea

      public double getArea()
      Calculate the area of the triangle.
      Specified by:
      getArea in class Shape
      Returns:
      The area in square pixels

    • contains

      public boolean contains(int x, int y)
      Check if a point is inside the triangle (rough approximation).
      Specified by:
      contains in class Shape
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the point
      y - The y coordinate of the point
      Returns:
      true if the point is approximately inside the triangle

    • copy

      public Triangle copy()
      Create a copy of this triangle.
      Specified by:
      copy in class Shape
      Returns:

      Get the current height of the triangle.
      Returns:

    • getPerimeter

      public double getPerimeter()
      Calculate the perimeter of the triangle (assuming isosceles triangle).
      Returns:
      The approximate perimeter in pixels

    • isEquilateral

      public boolean isEquilateral()
      Check if this triangle is equilateral (rough check).
      Returns:
      true if width and height suggest an equilateral triangle

    • getCenterX

      public int getCenterX()
      Get the center x coordinate of the triangle.
      Returns:
      The center x coordinate

    • getCenterY

      public int getCenterY()
      Get the center y coordinate of the triangle.

      The center y coordinate

    • setWidth

      public void setWidth(int newWidth)
      Set only the width of the triangle.
      Parameters:
      newWidth - The new width in pixels

    • setHeight

      public void setHeight(int newHeight)
      Set only the height of the triangle.
      Parameters:
      newHeight - The new height in pixels

    • rotate

      public void rotate(int degrees)
      Rotate the triangle (visual approximation by changing orientation).
      Parameters:
      degrees - Rotation angle in degrees (currently only supports 180°)

    • getVertices

      public int[] getVertices()
      Get the coordinates of the three vertices.
      Returns:
      Array of [x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3] coordinates
